title: [仅供娱乐]灌水五十九首（其一）翻译（下）
author: 郁离子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 郁离子 于 2020-7-16 19:44 编辑 

书接上回：[url=[仅供娱乐]灌水五十九首（其一）翻译（上） https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1075660-1-1.html (出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)][仅供娱乐]灌水五十九首（其一）翻译（上）[/url]
请阅读上帖后再阅读本帖！
Now the Emperor is going to recover ancient system,how lucky we are!
Many talented people are in the heyday,it's a right moment for them to realize their great dreams.
Their rightness and talent enhance each other，just like stars shining in the sky.
My dream is to keep them from pouring water,let justice prevail for forever.
If there're anyone pouring water,please stop pouring water in the end.

replies.author: 小樱aaa
replies.txt_content: 这是从上个圣代复元古。垂衣贵**开始翻译了？

replies.author: 郁离子
replies.txt_content:
侯超航 发表于 2020-7-12 20:15
这是从上个圣代复元古。垂衣贵**开始翻译了？
本来就是书接上回啊！
